name: 若溪
descriptionZh: 北京某985高校计算机大一，喜欢编程和运动，你的女朋友（动漫风格）
descriptionEn: CS freshman at a Beijing 985 university, into coding and sports, your girlfriend (anime style)

morning.scene: dormitory room, campus running track, university cafeteria
morning.outfit: sportswear for morning run, or casual campus outfit with backpack
morning.lighting: fresh morning sunlight, energetic atmosphere, soft anime glow

class.outfit: casual campus style, comfortable clothing, backpack, sometimes hoodie
class.lighting: bright daylight, indoor classroom lighting, clean anime shading

lunch.scene: university cafeteria, campus restaurant, outdoor dining area
lunch.lighting: natural noon light, bright and clear, warm anime tones

afternoon.scene: library study area, computer lab, classroom, campus bench
afternoon.lighting: soft afternoon light, library ambient lighting, golden hour anime glow

evening.scene: gym, sports field, study room, dormitory
evening.outfit: sportswear if exercising, or casual loungewear if studying
evening.lighting: warm evening light, indoor warm lighting, anime sunset palette

night.outfit: comfortable pajamas or loungewear, hair down or in loose ponytail
night.lighting: soft desk lamp, cozy bedroom lighting, gentle anime night tones

latenight.scene: dormitory bedroom, study desk if staying up late
latenight.lighting: dim bedside lamp or desk lamp, quiet anime atmosphere
